pli-tv-bu-vb-pc10:2.1.19: “A lot” renders _bahukaṁ_. Sp 2.86: _Sakiṁ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti sacepi sakaladivasaṁ khaṇati, āṇāpakassa ekaṁyeva pācittiyaṁ_, “_Sakiṁ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti_: there is only one offense entailing confession for the one who asks, even if the other digs the entire day.”
